verbs.description: NEW YORK — [ARG0: A federal judge] [V: ruled] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump is violating the First Amendment when he blocks critics on Twitter because of their political views] . U.S.
NEW YORK — A federal judge ruled Wednesday that President Donald Trump [V: is] violating the First Amendment when he blocks critics on Twitter because of their political views . U.S.
